title: this happened when my teacher tried to show me a whiteboard on your app, im on the appimage version
body:
**Describe the bug**
when she screenmirrored the whiteboard it didn't worked and instead showed me this message
![Captura de pantalla -2024-08-01 18-57-08](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/781f2889-348d-477c-b09b-f1dd72718daa)


**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. 'Screenmirror any whiteboard as a teacher'
2. 'your student will not see nothing'

**Expected behavior**
the whiteboard should work like when you use it in your browser.

**Screenshots**
![Captura de pantalla -2024-08-01 18-57-08](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/644159bb-e1c2-4074-902d-118be12f5d60)
.

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Slackel Linux 64 bit
 - Installation package: Appimage
 - Version 1.8.1

**Debug**
When possible, please run the application from the terminal using `--webDebug` and try to reproduce the error.

The provide in this section the output from both the terminal and the browser debug console.

```bash
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

*IMPORTANT:* Ensure that you mask any sensitive information before posting the output.

**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.
